title: LF plat 3+ top
body:
Looking for a plat 3+ top laner

Requirements:
- Have a working mic with skype/discord/ts
- Able to commit 3-4 days a week
- Attitude to improve and get better

In interested, comment here or message me on 'EGA Annie Bot'

replies.body: Add me Xenomazul Plat 3 Top lane main :)
